channel.title: Dungeon World: Stuck in Jawbone (Sundays 9AM EDT in May)
channel.description:
Where did the missing wizard go? What does the weeping ghost want? Who are the bandits hiding in the sewer? What's going on at the factory? *What is wrong with this place?*
You probably didn't plan to stay long in a dying mountain town full of smog and secrets. But here you are, so you might as well make the best of it and figure out what's going on. Maybe somebody will even pay you for it.
Note: The default version contains implied/offscreen violence to children and domestic animals. We'll discuss lines & veils in the first session and make modifications where needed.
[date=2019-05-05 time=09:00:00 format="LLL" timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_P9O-5K1K3XGV5Hcwr [date=2019-05-12 time=09:00:00 format="LLL" timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_P9X9J2pl8tRbi9SnO [date=2019-05-19 time=09:00:00 format="LLL" timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_P9eTGCJWM3EID8RZA [date=2019-05-26 time=09:00:00 format="LLL" timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_P9ntKlbI3rB-4LIRH
